Jimi IoT/Concox to Showcase Cutting-Edge Solutions at CES 2024
Jimi IoT/Concox to Showcase Cutting-Edge Solutions at CES 2024
Jimi IoT/Concox, a leading provider of innovative IoT and telematics solutions, is thrilled to announce its participation in the upcoming International Consumer Electronics Show 2024. As a valued customer, we extend a warm invitation for you to join us at Booth 4166 in the West Hall of the Las Vegas Convention Center from January 9 to 12, 2024.
At CES 2024, Jimi IoT/Concox will unveil two groundbreaking solutions along with the latest in telematics devices. We invite you to experience firsthand the future of asset tracking and video telematics.
Key Highlights
Attach-and-Go Asset Tracking Solution
Explore the ease of monitoring cargoes, including perishables, and heavy equipment with our battery-powered, magnetic-mount asset trackers such as the LL303 and LL701.
AI-Powered Video Telematics Solution
Witness a revolution in reducing false claims, enhancing driver performance, and ensuring safety with our ADAS- and DMS-powered multi-channel dashcams like the JC450 and JC400.
Event Details
Must-See Products
Be sure to check out these innovations and more at our booth. Our team will be on hand to provide in-depth insights and answer any questions you may have.
We Value Your Partnership
As our trusted business partner, your continued support has played a pivotal role in our success. We look forward to sharing the excitement of CES 2024 with you and showcasing the latest advancements that will shape the future of IoT and telematics.
About Jimi IoT/Concox
Jimi IoT/Concox is a global leader in providing cutting-edge IoT and telematics solutions. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, we empower businesses with advanced technologies that redefine connectivity and tracking.
Contact
For media inquiries or to schedule a meeting during CES 2024, please contact [info@jimilab.com].
Visit [Jimi IoT] for more information on our products and solutions.
Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to welcoming you at CES 2024!

Jimi IoT/Concox Wraps Up a Remarkable Showcase at CES 2024
Jimi IoT/Concox Wraps Up a Remarkable Showcase at CES 2024
As the curtain falls on CES 2024, Jimi IoT/Concox looks back on an exhilarating experience at one of the world’s premier tech events. Our heartfelt appreciation goes out to the incredible individuals who visited Booth 4166 in the West Hall of the Las Vegas Convention Center from January 9 to 12, 2024. Your presence added immense value to our CES journey.
Highlights from CES 2024
At this year’s CES, Jimi IoT/Concox unveiled two groundbreaking solutions and showcased the latest advancements in telematics devices.
Attach-and-Go Asset Tracking Solution
Demonstrated the simplicity of monitoring cargoes, including perishables, and heavy equipment using battery-powered, magnetic-mount asset trackers like the LL303 and LL701.
AI-Powered Video Telematics Solution
Showcased the transformative impact of ADAS- and DMS-powered multi-channel dashcams such as the JC450 and JC400 in reducing false claims, enhancing driver performance, and ensuring safety.
What’s Next
As we draw the curtains on our CES 2024 expedition, Jimi IoT/Concox remains at the forefront of innovation in the IoT and telematics domain. The echoes of CES still reverberate, and we are enthusiastic about translating the impetus gained into tangible advancements.
In particular, our partnership with Flespi stands as a beacon of collaborative excellence. We extend our heartfelt gratitude for the depth of cooperation we share with Flespi. The seamless integration of our showcased products at CES with the Flespi platform underscores the synergy between our technologies.
Furthermore, a momentous collaboration with FleetHoster is on the horizon. FleetHoster’s distinguished expertise in Fleet Management positions us strategically to enhance our service footprint in North America. This strategic alliance promises not only to fortify our market presence but also to capitalize on FleetHoster’s strengths for mutual growth and innovation.
As we navigate this new chapter of partnerships, the future looks promising, with the convergence of cutting-edge technologies and industry leadership paving the way for unprecedented solutions in IoT and fleet management. Stay tuned for the remarkable journey ahead!
About Fleet Hoster
Fleet Hoster is a leading provider of cutting-edge fleet management solutions, offering a comprehensive suite of tools designed to optimize fleet operations. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, Fleet Hoster delivers advanced technology solutions that empower businesses to achieve their operational goals.
About Flespi
Flespi, the innovative backend platform by Gurtam, a company with over 20 years of exceptional software engineering practice in the realm of GPS tracking. With extensive experience developing the Wialon cloud solution, currently operational on numerous servers and processing real-time data from over 3 million connected vehicles, Gurtam brings a wealth of expertise to the flespi platform. Every architectural concept and code implementation in flespi is informed by this invaluable background, making it a reliable and well-crafted solution for easy telematics, designed from developers to developers.
About Jimi IoT/Concox
Jimi IoT/Concox is a global leader in providing cutting-edge IoT and telematics solutions. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, we empower businesses with advanced technologies that redefine connectivity and tracking.

2023 Shenzhen Jimi IoT Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved

As we prepare to unveil its potential at CES 2024, let’s take a sneak peek into what makes JC181 the future of fleet management.
Dual-Channel Mastery: See Beyond Limits
Bid farewell to compromises. The JC181 introduces dual-channel recording, offering a real-time, simultaneous view of both the road ahead and the cab’s interior. It’s like giving your fleet a pair of vigilant eyes, ensuring every detail is captured as it unfolds on the journey.
Video Surveillance Redefined
Powered by robust LTE connectivity, the JC181 elevates video surveillance to new heights. Live monitoring of your vehicle’s interior and exterior becomes not just a feature but a lifeline. With critical video clips stored on the device, you have the power to replay moments on-demand, from anywhere, at any time.
Beyond Dashcam: Your Fleet’s Navigator
The JC181 goes beyond the typical dashcam functionalities. Transform it into a comprehensive tracking solution with its built-in GPS logger. Stamp crucial data directly onto images or video clips — from speed to coordinates — providing a rich layer of insights for fleet managers.
Compact Brilliance: Where Form Meets Function
Designed with subtlety and impact in mind, the JC181‘s compact size allows for discreet installation behind the rearview mirror without obstructing the driver’s view. It seamlessly integrates into the vehicle, ready to capture every moment without drawing unnecessary attention.
Security Redefined: Proactive Measures for Peace of Mind
Safety takes center stage with the JC181’s innovative security features. Utilize Tracksolid Pro to remotely cut off fuel/power to a vehicle moving under 20km/h — a powerful tool in theft prevention. It’s not just surveillance; it’s about empowering fleet managers with proactive security measures.
Tailored for Excellence: Versatility Across Industries
The JC181 isn’t a one-size-fits-all solution; it’s a versatile tool designed to meet the dynamic needs of various industries. From taxi services to online ride-hailing and the auto insurance sector, the JC181 seamlessly integrates into diverse fleet management scenarios.
Uniting Powerhouses: JC181 Meets Flespi
Excitingly, the JC181 seamlessly integrates with the Flespi platform, creating a synergy that enhances data management and analytics capabilities for fleet operators. Witness the power of this dynamic integration as JC181 and Flespi join forces to shape the future of efficient fleet management.
Join us at CES 2024 as we unveil the JC181, and let’s embark together on a journey where innovation meets excellence, setting a new standard for the future of fleet management.
Why JimiIoT & Concox
JimiIoT & Concox is a global leader in innovative IoT solutions. We provide cutting-edge hardware and software tailored to enhance efficiency and connectivity. Our range of products includes advanced GPS tracking devices, asset management solutions, smart vehicle dashcams, and telematics platforms. With a focus on technological excellence and customer satisfaction, we empower businesses to optimize operations and gain valuable insights from data-driven analytics. Trust JimiIoT to drive positive change and unlock growth opportunities in the digital age.

JimiIoT to Showcase Latest State-of-the-Art IoT Devices to the World at MWC 2022
News provided by
26 Sep, 2022, 09:15 ET
Share this article
Share this article
LAS VEGAS, Sept. 26, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- JimiIoT, a leading provider of Internet of Things (IoT) telematics devices and cloud services, will showcase its latest technologically advanced dashcam JC450 and telematics solutions at MWC 2022 in Las Vegas.
The JC450, an LTE dashcam system designed specifically for use in vehicles, is capable of recording 5 separate channels simultaneously, and integrates ADAS and DMS algorithms that actively assist drivers in increasing their awareness and safety on the road by providing real-time, actionable alerts.
"We look forward to seeing you again at MWC after 2 years," said Alex Dai, Product Director of JimiIoT: "With the rapid development of telematics equipment, customers' needs have gradually changed from the quality demands for hardware equipment to information processing providers, and we are confident that JimiIoT will play a key role in this area."
At the exhibition, Dai will be on hand to discuss the future of IoT telematics systems, and highlight JimiIoT's solutions for GPS asset tracking and video telematics.
Other JimiIoT products that will be showcased at this exhibition include:
All these products which will be presented by JimiIoT on MWC, has completed the specific certification requirements by multiple countries, including CE, FCC, PTCRB, AT&T, T-Mobile, Verizon, TELEC certifications, and others.
As North America's most influential connectivity event, MWC Las Vegas brings the digital ecosystem together and showcases the latest trends in connectivity and mobile innovation. MWC Las Vegas 2022 will be held at Las Vegas Convention Center during September 28-30. JimiIoT will be located at booth [W1.820].
About JimiIoT
JimiIoT (Concox) is a major player in the IoT industry and is focused on IoT telematics and cloud services. The company provides reliable products and customized solutions to clients around the world in the areas of fleet management, asset tracking, personal care, device management, and shared mobility.
If you would like more information on our range of products and solutions, please visit the JimiIoT website, Facebook, LinkedIn, or directly contact the team via [email protected].

LL303 Redefines Fleet Management: Showcasing Excellence at CES 2024
LL303 Redefines Fleet Management: Showcasing Excellence at CES 2024
As we step into the future of fleet management, JimiIoT proudly presents the LL303, a 4G solar-powered GPS tracker that redefines industry standards. Set to make its debut at the highly anticipated CES 2024, the LL303 embodies innovation, sustainability, and advanced technology. This groundbreaking device is not just a tracker; it’s a comprehensive solution designed to elevate fleet management strategies to new heights.
Sustainable Power and Uninterrupted Connectivity:
The LL303 harnesses the power of solar energy, paving the way for sustainable and eco-friendly fleet management. With its solar panel, magnetic charger, and IP67 waterproof rating, this device ensures optimal performance even in challenging environments. The inclusion of LTE communication with GSM (2G) fallback guarantees a robust and uninterrupted connection, a crucial aspect in fleet management where reliability is paramount.
Versatility Tailored to Your Needs:
The LL303 is more than just a tracker; it’s a versatile solution catering to a spectrum of deployments. Whether overseeing construction vehicles, managing vessels, or optimizing other assets, this device adapts to diverse fleet management strategies. Its multiple working modes, support for various peripheral accessories, and a suite of event-triggered alerts make the LL303 an indispensable tool for dynamic fleet operations.
Continuing Excellence at CES 2024:
Building on past successes, JimiIoT is delighted to feature the LL303 at CES 2024. This global platform provides an opportunity for industry leaders, tech enthusiasts, and potential partners to witness the ongoing evolution of fleet management technology. Join us at our booth to experience the LL303 live, interact with our experts, and explore firsthand how this device continues to redefine fleet management excellence.
Integration with Flespi Platform:
In our commitment to providing seamless solutions, we are excited to share that the LL303 is fully compatible with the Flespi platform. Flespi, our trusted partner in telematics, has adapted its platform to ensure smooth integration with the LL303. This collaboration enhances the overall user experience, offering a unified and efficient fleet management solution.
Experience LL303 Live at CES 2024:
We extend a warm invitation to all industry professionals, enthusiasts, and potential collaborators to visit our booth at CES 2024. Immerse yourself in the world of the LL303, explore its features, and witness firsthand the future of fleet management. Our team will be on-site to provide in-depth demonstrations, answer your questions, and discuss how the LL303 can transform your fleet operations.
Seamless Adaptation with Flespi – Learn More:
For detailed information on how to seamlessly integrate the LL303 with the Flespi platform, please visit [LL303-Flespi] to access step-by-step guides, resources, and support. This collaboration ensures that you can harness the full potential of the LL303 within the Flespi ecosystem.

Shenzhen Jimi loT Co., Ltd, founded in 2015, is a national high-tech loT company focusing on location-based service. Based on connections empowered by loT devices and Saas service platform, and by applying techniques such as intelligent sensing, loT, cloud computing, big data, Al and mobile internet, Jimi loT offers total solutions that include hardware R&D and production, platform development and deployment, system integration, and much more. Our business reaches many fields, that is, Smart Fleet Management, Smart Electric Scooter Management, Smart Asset and Logistics Management, Smart Campus, Smart Livestock Management.
Jimi loT has been deeply rooted in software and hardware solutions based on location services for several years. Our main hardware includes smart terminals for vehicles, e-scooters, assets and cargos, and the livestock; smart student ID cards; and more. We have also established platforms for managing loT Hub accesses, connections (CMP), and hardware (AMS). We have a lead in production scale, technological level, product quality, and economic returns, and have a competitive edge with similar products overseas.
Jimi loT, headquartered in Shenzhen, has established R&D centers in Huizhou, and local offices in U.S., Russia, India, and other countries and regions.
For many years, we have been striving to enable location-based commercial applications and to help traditional industries with digital transformation and collaboration. Being persistent in creating long-term value for society, we have also been pursuing growth relentlessly, promoting innovation actively, and facing every challenge with optimism.

About Jimi IoT
Jimi IoT is a company that focuses on the design and production of connected devices, operating in the Internet of Things (IoT) industry. The company offers a range of tracking solutions for vehicles, bikes, and other assets, as well as dash cameras and related accessories. These products are primarily used in sectors such as government, insurance, logistics and delivery, micro-mobility, rental and leasing, taxi and ride-hailing, asset management, and construction and mining. It is based in Shenzhen, Guangdong.

The value of goods in this market includes related services sold by the creators of the goods. Europe was the largest region in the GPS tracking device market in 2022. The regions covered in GPS tracking device report are Asia-Pacific, Western Europe, Eastern Europe, North America, South America, Middle East and Africa. GPS tracking device refers to software equipment that provides information on surveillance of location to track the location of an entity or object remotely via the use of the Global Positioning System (GPS). It is used by fleet managers to locate asset on a route, report on traffic conditions, and keep track vehicles other activities. The main GPS tracking device types are standalone trackers, obd devices, and advance trackers.A standalone tracker is a separate unit or device used for GPS tracking operations. The various deployments are commercial vehicles, and cargo and containers applied in automotive, aerospace and defense, healthcare, and transportation. The increasing demand for commercial vehicles is expected to propel the growth of the GPS tracking device market going forward.A commercial vehicle refers to a vehicle registered to a company, such as company cars, fleet vehicles, or other vehicles that are used to transport goods and general equipment for commercial or business purposes. GPS tracking devices are used in commercial vehicles to keep track of the vehicle, improve vehicle maintenance, and enhance customer service by providing real-time status.Therefore, the increasing demand for commercial vehicles is driving the growth of the GPS tracking device market. For instance, in 2023, according to the International Organization of Motor Vehicle Manufacturers, a Paris-based international trade association, production of commercial vehicles in the USA increased by 10% from 7,604,154 in 2021 to 8,308,603 in 2022.Further, the production of commercial vehicles in Argentina increased by 24% from 250,647 in 2021 to 279,388 in 2022. Therefore, the increasing demand for commercial vehicles is driving the growth of the GPS tracking device market. Product innovations are a key trend gaining popularity in the GPS tracking device market.Major companies operating in the GPS tracking device market are focused on developing new solutions to strengthen their position in the market. For instance, in January 2022, ATrack Technology Inc., a China-based company that designs and manufactures telematics hardware, launched the AL300 LTE-M waterproof tracker with IP67 waterproof and dustproof functions. The tracker is designed to support heavy machinery or transportation equipment such as refrigerated trucks, trailers, scooters, and agricultural and construction heavy machinery that needs to be monitored for a long time and placed outdoors. It assists with heavy outdoor machinery and transportation equipment to effectively control costs. Through this acquisition, Trina combines Solar’s State Key Laboratory’s leading technology with Nclave’s technology for smart trackers, enhancing it as a one-stop solution for efficient tracker products. NCLAVE Renewable S.L. is a Spain-based company that designs, manufactures, and maintains fixed tilts and solar trackers. results.raw_content:
Jimi IoT/Concox Wraps Up a Remarkable Showcase at CES 2024
Jimi IoT/Concox Wraps Up a Remarkable Showcase at CES 2024
As the curtain falls on CES 2024, Jimi IoT/Concox looks back on an exhilarating experience at one of the world’s premier tech events. Our heartfelt appreciation goes out to the incredible individuals who visited Booth 4166 in the West Hall of the Las Vegas Convention Center from January 9 to 12, 2024. Your presence added immense value to our CES journey.
Highlights from CES 2024
At this year’s CES, Jimi IoT/Concox unveiled two groundbreaking solutions and showcased the latest advancements in telematics devices.
Attach-and-Go Asset Tracking Solution
Demonstrated the simplicity of monitoring cargoes, including perishables, and heavy equipment using battery-powered, magnetic-mount asset trackers like the LL303 and LL701.
AI-Powered Video Telematics Solution
Showcased the transformative impact of ADAS- and DMS-powered multi-channel dashcams such as the JC450 and JC400 in reducing false claims, enhancing driver performance, and ensuring safety.
What’s Next
As we draw the curtains on our CES 2024 expedition, Jimi IoT/Concox remains at the forefront of innovation in the IoT and telematics domain. The echoes of CES still reverberate, and we are enthusiastic about translating the impetus gained into tangible advancements.
In particular, our partnership with Flespi stands as a beacon of collaborative excellence. We extend our heartfelt gratitude for the depth of cooperation we share with Flespi. The seamless integration of our showcased products at CES with the Flespi platform underscores the synergy between our technologies.
Furthermore, a momentous collaboration with FleetHoster is on the horizon. FleetHoster’s distinguished expertise in Fleet Management positions us strategically to enhance our service footprint in North America. This strategic alliance promises not only to fortify our market presence but also to capitalize on FleetHoster’s strengths for mutual growth and innovation.
As we navigate this new chapter of partnerships, the future looks promising, with the convergence of cutting-edge technologies and industry leadership paving the way for unprecedented solutions in IoT and fleet management. Stay tuned for the remarkable journey ahead!
About Fleet Hoster
Fleet Hoster is a leading provider of cutting-edge fleet management solutions, offering a comprehensive suite of tools designed to optimize fleet operations. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, Fleet Hoster delivers advanced technology solutions that empower businesses to achieve their operational goals.
About Flespi
Flespi, the innovative backend platform by Gurtam, a company with over 20 years of exceptional software engineering practice in the realm of GPS tracking. With extensive experience developing the Wialon cloud solution, currently operational on numerous servers and processing real-time data from over 3 million connected vehicles, Gurtam brings a wealth of expertise to the flespi platform. Every architectural concept and code implementation in flespi is informed by this invaluable background, making it a reliable and well-crafted solution for easy telematics, designed from developers to developers.
About Jimi IoT/Concox
Jimi IoT/Concox is a global leader in providing cutting-edge IoT and telematics solutions. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, we empower businesses with advanced technologies that redefine connectivity and tracking.

Jimi IoT/Concox to Showcase Cutting-Edge Solutions at CES 2024
Jimi IoT/Concox to Showcase Cutting-Edge Solutions at CES 2024
Jimi IoT/Concox, a leading provider of innovative IoT and telematics solutions, is thrilled to announce its participation in the upcoming International Consumer Electronics Show 2024. As a valued customer, we extend a warm invitation for you to join us at Booth 4166 in the West Hall of the Las Vegas Convention Center from January 9 to 12, 2024.
At CES 2024, Jimi IoT/Concox will unveil two groundbreaking solutions along with the latest in telematics devices. We invite you to experience firsthand the future of asset tracking and video telematics.
Key Highlights
Attach-and-Go Asset Tracking Solution
Explore the ease of monitoring cargoes, including perishables, and heavy equipment with our battery-powered, magnetic-mount asset trackers such as the LL303 and LL701.
AI-Powered Video Telematics Solution
Witness a revolution in reducing false claims, enhancing driver performance, and ensuring safety with our ADAS- and DMS-powered multi-channel dashcams like the JC450 and JC400.
Event Details
Must-See Products
Be sure to check out these innovations and more at our booth. Our team will be on hand to provide in-depth insights and answer any questions you may have.
We Value Your Partnership
As our trusted business partner, your continued support has played a pivotal role in our success. We look forward to sharing the excitement of CES 2024 with you and showcasing the latest advancements that will shape the future of IoT and telematics.
About Jimi IoT/Concox
Jimi IoT/Concox is a global leader in providing cutting-edge IoT and telematics solutions. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, we empower businesses with advanced technologies that redefine connectivity and tracking.
Contact
For media inquiries or to schedule a meeting during CES 2024, please contact [info@jimilab.com].
Visit [Jimi IoT] for more information on our products and solutions.
Thank you for your continued partnership. We look forward to welcoming you at CES 2024!
Copyright
2023 Shenzhen Jimi IoT Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved

results.raw_content:
ALL PRODUCTS
With more than 20 years in the IoT industry, Jimi IoT is an industry leader in the design and production of connected devices that power improvements in connected industries like logistics and shipping, fleet management, car and e-bike rentals and insurance, industrial fabrication, personal security and many more. Please contact us if you cannot find a product that meets your specific needs, we might have an ideal solution for you.
You can rest assured with our products as we offer a 13 month warranty on all our tracking and DVR equipment. If you choose to bundle your equipment with our platform Tracksolid Pro, the warranty period will be extended to 24 months. Equipment will continue to receive regular software updates to address bugs, problems or functional changes. Software updates for the device will be available for a minimum of 36 months from the date of manufacture. Support will be updated and extended as the lifecycle of the device changes. This will be announced on the official website (www.Tracksolidpro.com).
